message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for the product. Let me know if we can reach an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is closer to my bottom line.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still feel that $15,000 is the maximum I can afford. Would you consider meeting me at $15,000?
